posts.post_content:
Super long-shot, but what the heck... I'm looking to buy a minor league playing days team postcard showing Moonlight Graham.  I know that several exist with him as a member of the Scranton Miners. If you have one of these that you might be willing to sell, please contact me via PM.

Regards,

Andrew Finkelman
I'm not for sale-unless you pay me an awful lot!!! :D

Would need an eBay authenticity guarantee, and would ship to PWCC vault... ;)

[quote name="Moonlight Graham" post=2301034]I'm not for sale-unless you pay me an awful lot!!! :D[/QUOTE]
